title: Solved Mysteries; or, Revelations of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: The task occupied some time, and while I was thus engaged my fugitive was making a strange journey. His race did not end till he had reached the Queen's Park, when, finding himself not pursued, he got into hiding among the whins above St Margaret's Loch. There he loitered till nightfall, when he made his way down to Leith Harbour.
